changes:
* Support arm64 devices running iOS 8
* Update Facebook iOS SDK to 3.18.0
* Return permissions granted&denied by facebook.authorize() and facebook.hasAuthorized() calls (iOS)
* Support Facebook app usage stats (iOS)
description:
Access the Facebook SDK.

The facebook module allows access to native Facebook SDK features including SSO authentication through the Facebook app, Facebook share dialog access and Facebook graph API access.
